EmailTemplate.textOnly: Now you’re ready to modernize your teller system and connect your customer touchpoints to deliver that consistent, seamless experience, let us tell you about NCR’s Channel Services Platform. NCR Channel Services Platform is a cloud-based, API-driven solution that provides agility to adapt to evolving business needs. It connects your existing customer touchpoints — digital, ATM and branch, enables you to easily develop and integrate new services and offers a modern user interface to help your team do their jobs better, and faster to deliver the best experience for your customers.
